Mythology & Folklore.name: Whispers of the Wild: Folklore & Beasts
Mythology & Folklore.description: Delve into the realm of folklore and uncover the secrets of mythical creatures. This quiz explores legends from around the world, testing your knowledge of fantastical beings and their origins. Prepare to encounter jackalopes, griffins, and more!

questions.text: According to folklore, the 'jackalope' is an antlered version of what animal?

questions.text: According to Greek mythology, who was Apollo's twin sister?

questions.text: Who is the mythological Roman goddess of flowers?
questions.hint: Her name is linked to the word ‘floral’ and springtime blooms.

questions.text: What is the name of the mountain where the mythological Greek gods live?
questions.hint: This mountain is the highest in Greece and home to Zeus and other deities.
